galleryPage.title: Optik Galereya
galleryPage.description: Bu [veb-ilova](/simulator) yordamida yaratilgan simulyatsiyalar to‘plami bo‘lib, ularni optikani interaktiv tarzda namoyish etish uchun foydalanish mumkin. Siz yangi materiallar qo‘shishingiz mumkin. Batafsil ma’lumot uchun [hissa qo‘shish qo‘llanmasi](/contributing/gallery) bilan tanishing. Xatolikni bildirish uchun [GitHub’da issue oching](/github/issues) yoki [ray-optics@phydemo.app](/email) manziliga elektron pochta yuboring.
